snippet: Across the country, Muslims have been addressing with their children a news cycle that includes Mr. Trump’s calls to kick Muslims out of the United States and the recent bombing in Manhattan....
abstract: Muslim parents across United States are facing dilemma of explaining to their children explosive politics roiling country during current presidential election, including anti-Muslim sentiment of Donald Trump; many struggle to teach their children to defend their religion without letting it define them.
lead_paragraph: Across the country, Muslims have been addressing with their children a news cycle that includes Mr. Trump’s calls to kick Muslims out of the United States and the recent bombing in Manhattan.

headline.main: ‘I Had a Scary Dream About Donald Trump’: Muslim Parents Face a Tense Election
headline.print_headline: Muslim Parents Grapple With How to Explain a Tumultuous Election
